Ted has confirmed that experimentals will be starting very soon. I don't think the exact day has been specified, [but the announcement is not a joke](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114641-Kerbal-Space-Program-version-1-0-is-entering-Experimental-staging?p=1818247&viewfull=1#post1818247). Cheers,

The hype train doesn't run on coal, it runs on Hype!!

Sleeping in the hype train coal box. Less likely to get trampled by the impending hordes, cuz when we start seeing builds rotate out in a hurry there's going to be a stamped to the hype train and giddy squees that make a Justin Bieber concert sound tame. 

Also, dubbing girl Kerbals Girbals.

One "side-effect" to version 1.0, is that the game mechanics will be more mature, so shouldn't change so much on following versions allowing mods (and savegames) to be used across versions, to those like me who don't play that much (nor that fast) it means not having to restart again...

> 
> P.S.
> 
> Do you know how the HypeValvegear works? I assume that it's a HypeWalschaerts type.

HypeCoal is combusted in the firebox, which heats water into HypeSteam which builds HypePressure which powers the pistons that drive the wheels. And the Valve Gear isn't anything special, just part of the structural components really. Anyway, the Valve Gear is a Gresley Conjugated Valve Gear, just like the other A3 class locomotives.

You're not the fireman. A good fireman would know this. I'm sorry.
